INSERT /* UsersMapper.insertUser */ INTO ST_USERS ( USER_UID, ACCOUNT_ID, ACCOUNT_NAME, ACCOUNT_PWD, ACCOUNT_NICKNAME, ACCOUNT_TYPE, PWD_HASH_VALUE, PWD_EXPIRED_DT, ACTIVE, EMAIL, VERIFIED_EMAIL, MOBILE, VERIFIED_MOBILE, ACCOUNT_LOCKED, ACCOUNT_EXPIRED_DT, ORG_CD, TEAM_CD, REG_DT, REG_UID ) VALUES ( #{userUid}, #{accountId}, #{accountName}, #{accountPwd}, #{accountNickname},#{accountType}, #{pwdHashValue}, null, #{active}, #{email}, #{verifiedEmail}, #{mobile} , #{verifiedMobile}, #{accountLocked}, null, #{orgCd}, #{teamCd}, GETDATE() , #{userUid} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE ST_USERS
account_name = #{accountName},
account_nickname = #{accountNickname},
account_pwd = #{accountPwd},
account_type = #{accountType},
pwd_hash_value = #{pwdHashValue},
pwd_expired_dt = CONVERT(DATETIME, #{pwdExpiredDt}, 120),
active = #{active},
email = #{email},
verified_email = #{verifiedEmail},
mobile = #{mobile} ,
verified_mobile = #{verifiedMobile},
account_locked = #{accountLocked},
org_cd = #{orgCd},
team_cd = #{teamCd},
last_login_ip = #{lastLoginIp},
last_login_dt = CONVERT(DATETIME, #{lastLoginDt}, 120),
mod_uid = #{modUid}, mod_dt = GETDATE()
AND USER_UID = #{userUid}
AND account_id = #{accountId}
mapper.select: SELECT /* UsersMapper.selectUserByKey */ user_uid, account_id, account_name, account_pwd, account_nickname, account_type, pwd_hash_value, CONVERT(NVARCHAR(19), pwd_expired_dt, 120) AS pwdExpiredDt, active, email, verified_email, mobile, verified_mobile, account_locked, CONVERT(NVARCHAR(19), account_expired_dt, 120) AS accountExpiredDt, last_login_ip, CONVERT(NVARCHAR(19), last_login_dt, 120) AS lastLoginDt, org_cd, team_cd, CONVERT(NVARCHAR(19), reg_dt, 20) AS regDt, reg_uid FROM ST_USERS WHERE USER_UID = #{userUid}

SELECT user_uid, account_id, account_name, account_pwd, account_nickname, account_type, pwd_hash_value, CONVERT(NVARCHAR(19), pwd_expired_dt, 120) AS pwdExpiredDt, active, email, verified_email, mobile, verified_mobile, account_locked, CONVERT(NVARCHAR(19), account_expired_dt, 120) AS accountExpiredDt, last_login_ip, CONVERT(NVARCHAR(19), last_login_dt, 120) AS lastLoginDt, org_cd, dbo.FN_GET_CODE_NAME('C06', org_cd) as org_nm, team_cd, dbo.FN_GET_CODE_NAME('C07', team_cd) as team_nm, CONVERT(NVARCHAR(19), reg_dt, 120) AS regDt, reg_uid FROM ST_USERS WHERE ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId}

SELECT /* UsersMapper.selectUsers */ user_uid, account_id, account_name, account_pwd, account_nickname, account_type, pwd_hash_value, CONVERT(NVARCHAR(19), pwd_expired_dt, 120) AS pwdExpiredDt, active, email, verified_email, mobile, verified_mobile, account_locked, CONVERT(NVARCHAR(19), account_expired_dt, 120) AS accountExpiredDt, last_login_ip, CONVERT(NVARCHAR(19), last_login_dt, 120) AS lastLoginDt, org_cd,
team_cd,
CONVERT(NVARCHAR(19), reg_dt, 120) AS regDt, reg_uid FROM ST_USERS a with (nolock)
AND user_uid = #{userUid} AND account_id = #{accountId} AND account_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{accountName}, '%') AND account_type = #{accountType} AND account_pwd = #{accountPwd} AND pwd_hash_value = #{pwdHashValue} AND active = #{active} AND email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{email} '%') AND verified_email = #{verifiedEmail} AND mobile LIKE CONCAT('%', #{mobile} '%') AND verified_mobile = #{verifiedMobile} AND org_cd = #{orgCd}

SELECT /* UsersMapper.selectGroupMemberById */ user_uid, account_id, account_name, account_pwd, account_nickname, account_type, pwd_hash_value, CONVERT(NVARCHAR(19), pwd_expired_dt, 120) AS pwdExpiredDt, active, email, verified_email, mobile, verified_mobile, account_locked, CONVERT(NVARCHAR(19), account_expired_dt, 120) AS accountExpiredDt, last_login_ip, CONVERT(NVARCHAR(19), last_login_dt, 120) AS lastLoginDt, org_cd, team_cd FROM ST_USERS WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE active = 'Y' AND user_uid IN ( SELECT user_uid FROM ST_AUTH_GROUP_MEMBER WHERE grp_uid = #{grpId} )
SELECT /* UsersMapper.selectUserRoleByKey selectUserAuthoritiesByKey */ user_uid, user_role, reg_dt FROM ST_USER_ROLES WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE user_uid = #{userUid}
SELECT /* UsersMapper.selectUserRoleById */ user_uid, user_role, reg_dt FROM ST_USER_ROLES WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE user_uid IN ( SELECT user_uid FROM ST_USERS WHERE account_id = #{accountId} )

SELECT /* UsersMapper.selectGroups */ grp_uid, grp_name, grp_remark, use_at FROM ST_AUTH_GROUPS WITH(NOLOCK)
AND grp_uid = #{grpUid} AND grp_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{grpName}, '%') AND grp_remark LIKE CONCAT('%', #{grpRemark}, '%') AND use_at = #{useAt}

SELECT /* UsersMapper.selectGroupsForHelper */ CAST(grp_uid AS VARCHAR(100)) AS grpUid, grp_name AS grpName, grp_remark AS grpRemark, use_at AS useAt FROM ST_AUTH_GROUPS WITH(NOLOCK)
AND grp_uid = #{grpUid} AND grp_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{grpName}, '%') AND grp_remark LIKE CONCAT('%', #{grpRemark}, '%') AND use_at = #{useAt}
SELECT /* UsersMapper.selectGroupsByKey */ GRP_UID AS grpUid, GRP_NAME AS grpName, GRP_REMARK AS grpRemark, USE_AT AS useAt FROM ST_AUTH_GROUPS WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE GRP_UID = #{grpUid}

SELECT /* UsersMapper.selectGroupsByKey */ GRP_UID AS grpUid, GRP_NAME AS grpName, GRP_REMARK AS grpRemark, USE_AT AS useAt FROM ST_AUTH_GROUPS WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE GRP_UID = (SELECT GRP_UID FROM ST_AUTH_GROUP_MEMBER WHERE USER_UID = #{userUID})

SELECT /* UsersMapper.selectGroupMembers */ #{grpUid} AS grpUid, a.USER_UID AS userUid, a.ACCOUNT_ID AS accountId, a.ACCOUNT_NAME AS accountName, a.ACCOUNT_NICKNAME AS accountNickname, a.ACCOUNT_TYPE AS accountType, a.ACTIVE AS active, a.EMAIL AS email, a.VERIFIED_EMAIL AS verifiedEmail, a.MOBILE AS mobile, a.VERIFIED_MOBILE AS verifiedMobile, a.ACCOUNT_LOCKED AS accountLocked, a.ACCOUNT_EXPIRED_DT AS accountExpiredDt, a.LAST_LOGIN_IP AS lastLoginIp, a.LAST_LOGIN_DT AS lastLoginDt, a.ORG_CD AS orgCd, a.TEAM_CD AS teamCd FROM ST_USERS a WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE user_uid IN ( SELECT USER_UID FROM ST_AUTH_GROUP_MEMBER WHERE grp_uid = #{grpUid} AND use_at = 'Y' )

SELECT /* UsersMapper.selectGroupOtherMembers */ #{grpUid} AS grpUid, a.USER_UID AS userUid, a.ACCOUNT_ID AS accountId, a.ACCOUNT_NAME AS accountName, a.ACCOUNT_NICKNAME AS accountNickname, a.ACCOUNT_TYPE AS accountType, a.ACTIVE AS active, a.EMAIL AS email, a.VERIFIED_EMAIL AS verifiedEmail, a.MOBILE AS mobile, a.VERIFIED_MOBILE AS verifiedMobile, a.ACCOUNT_LOCKED AS accountLocked, a.ACCOUNT_EXPIRED_DT AS accountExpiredDt, a.LAST_LOGIN_IP AS lastLoginIp, a.LAST_LOGIN_DT AS lastLoginDt, a.ORG_CD AS orgCd, a.TEAM_CD AS teamCd, FROM ST_USERS a WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE user_uid NOT IN ( SELECT USER_UID FROM ST_AUTH_GROUP_MEMBER WHERE grp_uid = #{grpUid} AND use_at = 'Y' )

SELECT /* UsersMapper.selectGroupAuthority */ case when a.grp_uid is not null then a.grp_uid else #{grpUid} end as grp_uid, a.menu_uid, b.menu_nm, b.menu_type, b.menu_short_nm, b.parent_uid, b.menu_icon, b.menu_lvl, b.menu_type, b.menu_path, b.redirect_path, b.display_at, ISNULL(a.view_perm_at, 'N') AS VIEW_PERM_AT, ISNULL(a.reg_perm_at, 'N') AS REG_PERM_AT, ISNULL(a.mod_perm_at, 'N') AS MOD_PERM_AT, ISNULL(a.del_perm_at, 'N') AS DEL_PERM_AT, ISNULL(a.exec_perm_at, 'N') AS EXEC_PERM_AT FROM ST_MENU b WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN ST_GROUP_AUTHORITY a WITH (NOLOCK) ON a.menu_uid = b.menu_uid AND b.use_at = 'Y' AND a.grp_uid = #{grpUid} WHERE b.parent_uid = #{parentUid} ORDER BY b.display_ord

SELECT /* UsersMapper.selectGroupAuthority */ a.grp_uid, b.Oid, b.Name, NULL, b.ParentOID, NULL, NULL, b.Link, ISNULL(a.view_perm_at, 'N') AS VIEW_PERM_AT, ISNULL(a.reg_perm_at, 'N') AS REG_PERM_AT, ISNULL(a.mod_perm_at, 'N') AS MOD_PERM_AT, ISNULL(a.del_perm_at, 'N') AS DEL_PERM_AT, ISNULL(a.exec_perm_at, 'N') AS EXEC_PERM_AT FROM V_BI_MENU b WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN ST_GROUP_AUTHORITY a WITH (NOLOCK) ON a.menu_uid = b.OID AND b.Isuse = 1
AND a.GRP_UID = #{grpUid} AND b.ParentOID = #{parentUid} AND b.ParentOID is NULL
ORDER BY b.Ord

SELECT /* UsersMapper.selectGroupAuthorityAllMenu */ a.MENU_UID, a.MENU_NM, a.MENU_TYPE, ISNULL(b.VIEW_PERM_AT, 'N') AS VIEW_PERM_AT, ISNULL(b.REG_PERM_AT, 'N') AS REG_PERM_AT, ISNULL(b.MOD_PERM_AT, 'N') AS MOD_PERM_AT, ISNULL(b.DEL_PERM_AT, 'N') AS DEL_PERM_AT, ISNULL(b.EXEC_PERM_AT, 'N') AS EXEC_PERM_AT FROM ST_MENU a LEFT OUTER JOIN ST_GROUP_AUTHORITY b ON a.MENU_UID = b.MENU_UID AND b.GRP_UID = #{grpUid} AND a.USE_AT = 'Y' WHERE a.PARENT_UID = #{parentUid} ORDER BY a.DISPLAY_ORD
mapper.insert: MERGE /* UsersMapper.saveGroupAuthority */ INTO ST_GROUP_AUTHORITY a USING ( SELECT #{grpUid} AS grp_uid , #{oid} AS menu_uid , #{viewPermAt} AS view_perm_at , #{regPermAt} AS reg_perm_at , #{modPermAt} AS mod_perm_at , #{delPermAt} AS del_perm_at , #{execPermAt} AS exec_perm_at , GETDATE() AS reg_dt , #{regUid} AS reg_uid ) b ON (a.grp_uid = b.grp_uid and a.menu_uid = b.menu_uid) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET view_perm_at = b.view_perm_at, reg_perm_at = b.reg_perm_at, mod_perm_at = b.mod_perm_at, del_perm_at = b.del_perm_at, exec_perm_at = b.exec_perm_at, mod_uid = b.reg_uid, mod_dt = b.reg_dt WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (grp_uid, menu_uid, view_perm_at, reg_perm_at, mod_perm_at, del_perm_at ,exec_perm_at, reg_dt, reg_uid) VALUES (b.grp_uid, b.menu_uid, b.view_perm_at, b.reg_perm_at, b.mod_perm_at, b.del_perm_at, b.exec_perm_at, b.reg_dt, b.reg_uid);

MERGE /* UsersMapper.appendGroupAuthority */ INTO ST_GROUP_AUTHORITY a USING ( SELECT #{grpUid} AS grp_uid, OID AS menu_uid, 'N' AS view_perm_at, 'N' AS reg_perm_at, 'N' AS mod_perm_at, 'N' AS del_perm_at, 'N' AS exec_perm_at, GETDATE() AS reg_dt, #{regUid} AS reg_uid FROM T_BMENU WHERE ISUSE = 1 AND MENUTYPE = #{menuType} UNION SELECT #{grpUid} AS grp_uid, OID AS menu_uid, 'N' AS view_perm_at, 'N' AS reg_perm_at, 'N' AS mod_perm_at, 'N' AS del_perm_at, 'N' AS exec_perm_at, GETDATE() AS reg_dt, #{regUid} AS reg_uid FROM T_BSUB_MENU WHERE ISUSE = 1 AND MENUOID IN ( SELECT OID FROM T_BMENU WHERE ISUSE = 1 AND MENUTYPE = #{menuType} ) ) b ON (a.grp_uid = b.grp_uid AND a.menu_uid = b.menu_uid) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (grp_uid, menu_uid, view_perm_at, reg_perm_at, mod_perm_at, del_perm_at, exec_perm_at, reg_dt, reg_uid) VALUES (b.grp_uid, b.menu_uid, b.view_perm_at, b.reg_perm_at, b.mod_perm_at, b.del_perm_at, b.exec_perm_at, b.reg_dt, b.reg_uid);

INSERT INTO ST_GROUP_AUTHORITY (grp_uid, menu_uid, view_perm_at, reg_perm_at, mod_perm_at, del_perm_at, exec_perm_at, reg_dt, reg_uid) SELECT G.GRP_UID, #{menuUid} AS MENU_UID, 'N' AS VIEW_PERM_AT, 'N' AS REG_PERM_AT, 'N' AS MOD_PERM_AT, 'N' AS DEL_PERM_AT, 'N' AS EXEC_PERM_AT, GETDATE() AS REG_DT, #{regUid} AS REG_UID FROM ST_AUTH_GROUPS G WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ST_GROUP_AUTHORITY A WHERE A.menu_uid = #{menuUid} AND A.grp_uid = G.GRP_UID );

MERGE /* UsersMapper.copyGroupAuthority */ INTO ST_GROUP_AUTHORITY a USING ( SELECT #{toGrpUid} as GRP_UID, MENU_UID, VIEW_PERM_AT, REG_PERM_AT, MOD_PERM_AT, DEL_PERM_AT, EXEC_PERM_AT, GETDATE() AS REG_DT, #{regUid} AS REG_UID FROM ST_GROUP_AUTHORITY WHERE GRP_UID = #{fromGrpUid} ) b ON (a.GRP_UID = b.GRP_UID AND a.MENU_UID = b.MENU_UID) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET a.VIEW_PERM_AT = b.VIEW_PERM_AT, a.REG_PERM_AT = b.REG_PERM_AT, a.MOD_PERM_AT = b.MOD_PERM_AT, a.DEL_PERM_AT = b.DEL_PERM_AT, a.EXEC_PERM_AT = b.EXEC_PERM_AT, a.MOD_DT = b.REG_DT, a.MOD_UID = b.REG_UID WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (grp_uid, menu_uid, view_perm_at, reg_perm_at, mod_perm_at, del_perm_at, exec_perm_at, reg_dt, reg_uid) VALUES (b.GRP_UID, b.MENU_UID, b.VIEW_PERM_AT, b.REG_PERM_AT, b.MOD_PERM_AT, b.DEL_PERM_AT, b.EXEC_PERM_AT, b.REG_DT, b.REG_UID);
mapper.select: SELECT /* UsersMapper.selectRefreshToken */ TOKEN_ID as tokenId, USER_UID as userUid, TOKEN as token FROM ST_REFRESH_TOKEN WHERE user_uid = #{userUid}
